variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: EDIC year

variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: ODB1
variable.description: B1. Current medication: has the patient used of over- the-counter medications?

variable.name: ODB1A1
variable.description: B1a1. Current medication: during the last month has the patient taken any aspirin?

variable.name: ODB1A2
variable.description: B1a2. Current medication: how many days, during the last month, has the patient taken any aspirin?

variable.name: ODB1A3
variable.description: B1a3. Current medication: how many tablets of aspirin has the patient taken during the last month?

variable.name: ODB1B
variable.description: B1b. Current medication: has the patient used of over- the-counter Tylenol, Advil , Motrin?
